title: Gordon Ramsay Cookalong Live - 104 avi (Plus Training Videos)
description:
Gordon&#039;s new series "Cookalong Live" episode 4 Plus Extras.

This week he&#039;s making:

* Prawn cocktail
* Steak Diane
* Mandarin cheesecake

For more info (ingredients & equipment lists, etc.) see: <a href="
http://www.channel4.com/food/on-tv/cookalong-live/cookalong-live-the-series/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.channel4.com/food/on-tv/cookalong-live/cookalong-live-the-series/</a>

Note!
I didn&#039;t realise this before, but each episode comes with four or five &#039;Training Videos&#039; that detail particular aspects of the cooking. These are available from the website (link above), but they&#039;re probably interesting and informative enough that you&#039;ll want to keep your own copy. So, I ripped and recoded them, and included them with this release.

In this torrent I&#039;ve included all of the training videos made available so far (i.e., for episodes 1 through 4), because I&#039;d already released episodes 1-3 without them.

Enjoy!

thePirateBay.org Rocks!
